price: ¡Claro que sí! Soy capaz incluso de recomponer sus huellas digitales.
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: balā qādirīna ʿalā an nusawwiya banānahu
